Page 2026 Fwd: Washington Post reporter reaching out From [b(6); (b(7)(C) To [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/07/23 20:31 Subject: Fwd: Washington Post reporter reaching out Attachments: TEXT.htm Please call me 203470 [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Thank you. Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone ------- Original message ------- From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Date: 7/23/19 6:32 PM (GMT-05:00) To: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Cc: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Subject: Fwd: Washington Post reporter reaching out >>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C) 07/23/2019 18:32 >>> [b(6); if you get any inquiries on this situation or inmate ( see below), please decline to comment. Thats all we will say on this. [b(6); (b)(7)(C) please forward my e Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @washpost.com
Subject: Washington Post reporter reaching out
>>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @washpost.com 07/23/2019 18:00 >>> Hi, I'm told that MCC inmate Jeffrey Epstein was found unconscious and unresponsive in his jail cell, and that there is currently an internal inquiry to determ 6330, can you please call? Thanks, [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Washington Post Page 11224

[b(6); if you get any inquiries on this situation or inmate ( see below), please decline to comment. Thats all we will say on this. [b(6); (b)(7)(C) please forward my e Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @washpost.com
Subject: Washington Post reporter reaching out
>>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @washpost.com 07/23/2019 18:00 >>> Hi, I'm told that MCC inmate Jeffrey Epstein was found unconscious and unresponsive in his jail cell, and that there is currently an internal inquiry to determ 6330, can you please call? Thanks, [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Washington Post

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The email discusses Jeffrey Epstein's condition in jail and an internal inquiry.
